ygData.subject: Re: Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: Very sorry, you guys have stated this.  Just ignore me =)  I didnt check all my mail, and replied to it before reading further. =) ...
ygData.messageBody:
Very sorry, you guys have stated this. Just ignore me =) I didnt
check all my mail, and replied to it before reading further. =)

--- Pam Arbogast <adira399@...> wrote:
> From: Pam Arbogast <adira399@...>
>
> One more little tidbit on this subject and if it's
> been stated already,
> I wholeheartedly apologize for not paying attention.
>
>
> I have heard, from a very official source, that kill
> stealing is not
> illegal. I have also been told, from that very same
> source, that
> trading with someone in battle, therefore disrupting
> them while they
> fight, IS ILLEGAL! It's also a bannable offense.
>
> What's wrong with this picture?
>
> Adira SoulSaver
> Bandaid of Tunare
> Rodcet Nife Server
>
